flavor: You were born into one of Balicâ€™s noble families. Your family owns a large estate outside the city-state and holds a seat in the Chamber of Patricians. Or are you a person of conscience, determined to use your wealth to improve the lot of the less fortunate?
name: Balic - Patrician
